title: 9월 첫수융합포럼개최- 전산학부＆인문사회과학부
content: title:9월 첫수융합포럼개최- 전산학부＆인문사회과학부 date:2020-09-09T00:00:00Z link:https://cs.kaist.ac.kr/board/view?bbs_id=events&bbs_sn=9327&page=1&skey=&svalue=&menu=86 content:전산학부와 인문사회과학부가 공동으로 개최하는 2020년 9월 첫수 융합포럼에 여러분을 초대합니다. School of Computing and School of Humanities&Social Sciences would like to invite you to "The First Wednesday Multidisciplinary Forum” on September 9th. 관심있는 분들의 많은 참여 바랍니다. ■ Date : September 9(Wed) 2020, 12:00~13:00 ■ Speakers & Subject - Prof. Jeong-woo Jang (School of Humanities&Social Sciences)/ Fake news, infodemic and news user - Prof. Brent Byung Hoon Kang (School of Computing) / Towards Confidential Computing based on TEE-anchored Privacy-Preserving Applications ■ Online Zoom https://bit.ly/2YN7hZt https://kaist.zoom.us/j/99840184159?pwd=K1VJbUtXcEUyenNiY04wMloxOHpzZz09 ■ Pre-registration : https://forms.gle/qzBQ4PfUe4x7gAQP8 ■ A small gift will be offered to participants in this forum through a raffle ■ Inquiry : 전산학부행정팀 김대종 (T. 3507), 인문사회과학부행정팀 (T. 4602) location: Online(zoom) tag:csweb.calendar
